original_title: 1,133 netted in 24 hours under Operation Yukthiya
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – 1,133 more suspects were arrested under Operation Yukthiya, in the 24-hour window that ended at 12.30 am on Saturday (06).
Police said that 24 of them are being interrogated upon detention orders.
Illegal asset investigations have been launched against 23 of the suspects.
Police said that 38 suspects were directed to drug rehabilitation centers.
86 suspects who were on the list prepared by the Police Narcotics Bureau and Special Bureau, were also arrested.
Power and Energy Minister calls for action against striking CEB workers
BASL demands end to rule by force, upholding law and justice
Avissawella – Colombo Low Level Road closed from 10pm on Saturday (06) to 5pm on Sunday (07)
